title: Earth Fault-Loop Impedance
fullText:
The impedance of the earth fault-current loop (active-to-earth loop) starting and ending at the point-of-earth fault.
NOTE: Clause 5.7 provides a description of the constituent parts of an earth fault-current loop.
Earthing conductor (see Clause 1.4.81 Main earthing conductor).
(see Clause 1.4.100 Protective earthing conductor).
